name: Beidou
desc: Captain of the Crux and its crew. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

elemSkill.name: Tidecaller
elemSkill.desc: #Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG. Hold Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP. Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice. The shield possesses the following properties: 路Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency. 路Applies the Electro element to Beidou upon activation. Conquer the high seas! Pursue the waves and chase the storm!

elemBurst.name: Stormbreaker
elemBurst.desc: Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents. Thunderbeast's Targe 路When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing Electro DMG. 路Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken. A maximum of 1 lightning discharge can be triggered per second. With a peal of thunder, Haishan is slain.

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Oceanborne
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

c13ns.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
c13ns.desc: When <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color> is used:\nCreates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.\nThis shield absorbs <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

c13ns.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
c13ns.desc: <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color>'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

c13ns.name: Summoner of Storm
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Tidecaller</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Stunning Revenge
c13ns.desc: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

c13ns.name: Crimson Tidewalker
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Bane of Evil
c13ns.desc: During the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color>, the <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro RES</color> of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.
